title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4405.5 - Overnight retention of monies
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4405.5 - Overnight retention of monies

State Regulations

Cash shall not be retained overnight in any branch office
unless the commission shall have determined that adequate safeguards exist with
respect to the retention of such monies. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4405.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
